item.title: Personal Awareness
item.dc:creator: drenkaby
item.content:encoded:
In a Nutshell

With our busy schedules it might be difficult to find time to think about whom we are, our strengths and weaknesses, our drives and personalities, our habits and values.  We're not always open to personal feedback, because honest feedback isn't always flattering.  Consequently, many of us have a pretty low level of self-awareness.  That's unfortunate, because self-awareness is an essential first step toward maximizing management skills.  Self-awareness can improve our judgment and help us identify opportunities for professional development and personal growth. It is one of the attributes of Emotional Intelligence and an important factor in achieving success.

item.title: Welcome & Platform Tour
item.dc:creator: drenkaby
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the Registration & Orientation!

This lesson will help you become familiar with the learning platform before you begin your Health & Safety and Elective courses. By the end of this lesson module, you will:

  • Understand how to navigate the platform and access your courses.
  • Know how to update and complete your Buzzjuice profile (a key step in your registration).
  • Identify where to find support resources, help articles, classrooms and community forums.
  • Gain confidence using the courses dashboard, menus, and course features.

This lesson is designed to take 5â€“7 minutes to complete. It is a prerequisite for the Registration & Orientation assessment later in this program.

item.title: Personal Awareness
item.dc:creator: drenkaby
item.content:encoded:
In a Nutshell

With our busy schedules it might be difficult to find time to think about whom we are, our strengths and weaknesses, our drives and personalities, our habits and values.  We're not always open to personal feedback, because honest feedback isn't always flattering.  Consequently, many of us have a pretty low level of self-awareness.  That's unfortunate, because self-awareness is an essential first step toward maximizing management skills.  Self-awareness can improve our judgment and help us identify opportunities for professional development and personal growth. It is one of the attributes of Emotional Intelligence and an important factor in achieving success.

item.title: Website Setup
item.dc:creator: drenkaby
item.content:encoded: Our Website SetupÂ connects your blog to the Koware community. This means that posts made to your blog can automatically feature in Koware's Site Stream. Blogs and websites can be set up with any web service provider; however, â€˜Wordpress.comâ€™ integrates best with the Koware Community. This guide will help to set up your blog or website with Wordpress.com

item.title: Subscriptions & Pricing
item.dc:creator: drenkaby
item.content:encoded:
Lesson Introduction

Welcome to Lesson Module 2 of the Registration & Orientation program.
In this lesson module, you will learn how Buzzjuice subscriptions work, why they are required for access to some course content, and how to manage payments and renewals.

Your subscription fee â€” is your registration key. It unlocks course access, keeps your account active, and ensures you remain in good standing. Understanding the subscription tiers and rules will help you avoid interruptions in your learning journey.

item.title: Access Rules & Gating
item.dc:creator: drenkaby
item.content:encoded:
Lesson Introduction:
Welcome to Lesson 3 of the Buzzjuice Registration & Orientation program.

In this lesson, youâ€™ll learn how the Buzzjuice Courses platform manages access to Health & Safety and Elective content using subscription plans, registration & orientation status and gating rules. These rules ensure fairness, protect course integrity, and guarantee that only prepared learners access exclusive material.

By the end of this lesson, you will:

  • Understand what courses require a subscription.
  • Know what the â€œexclusive-contentâ€ tag means.
  • Recognize why Registration & Orientation completion is required.
  • Learn what happens if a subscription expires or lapses mid-course.
  • Be able to explain the necessary steps required to restore access after expiry.

item.title: Expiry, Retention & Re-registration
item.dc:creator: drenkaby
item.content:encoded:
Lesson Introduction

Welcome to Lesson 4: Expiry, Retention & Re-registration.

Every learnerâ€™s Registration & Orientation (R&O) status on Buzzjuice Courses is valid for 12 months. This rule ensures that learners remain active, compliant with platform policies, and up to date with subscription requirements.

In this lesson, you will learn:

  • How long your orientation status lasts.
  • What happens when the 12 month limit is reached.
  • How your data and course progress are managed.
  • The steps to re-register and continue your studies.

By the end of this lesson, youâ€™ll understand the importance of renewing your subscription on time and how to maintain uninterrupted access to Health & Safety course content.

item.title: Academy Bylaws, Conduct & Assessment Rules
item.dc:creator: drenkaby
item.content:encoded:
Lesson Introduction

Welcome to Lesson 5 â€” Bylaws, Conduct & Assessment Rules.

In this lesson, you will learn about the community standards, rules, and responsibilities that apply to every Buzzjuice Courses member. These guidelines ensure that our learning environment is safe, respectful, and fair for all.

By the end of this lesson, you should be able to:

  • Understand the categories of bylaws that govern Buzzjuice Courses.
  • Recognize the importance of academic honesty and proper conduct.
  • Know where to find the full bylaws and how to contribute to their development.
  • Apply the rules that affect how you take quizzes, assessments, and interact in the community.

item.title: Support, Certificates & Next Steps
item.dc:creator: drenkaby
item.content:encoded:
Lesson Introduction

Welcome to Lesson 6 of your Registration & Orientation program.

By now, you have learned about subscriptions, exclusive-content access rules, expiry timelines, and bylaws. This lesson focuses on three key areas that will help you succeed on the Buzzjuice platform:

  • How to get help and support when you need it.
  • What happens when you successfully complete this orientation (certificates, badges, and roles).
  • The immediate next steps to begin your Health & Safety journey.

Completing this lesson ensures that you know exactly where to go for assistance, how your achievements are recognized, and how to continue smoothly into the Health & Safety diploma program.
